item.title: Share PC internet connection over wifi in ubuntu
item.dc:creator: Avinash Dalvi
item.description:
Trying to share PC internet connection using WiFi device or dongle in Ubuntu Os ? To get started, press Ctrl+Alt+T on keyboard to open the terminal. When it opens, run the commands below one by one to install ap-hotspot. Ap-hotspot…

The post Share PC internet connection over wifi in ubuntu appeared first on .
item.content:encoded:
Trying to share PC internet connection using WiFi device or dongle in Ubuntu Os ?

To get started, press Ctrl+Alt+T on keyboard to open the terminal. When it opens, run the commands below one by one to install ap-hotspot.

Ap-hotspot is an open-source project that automatically creates an infrastructure (Access Point mode) wireless hotspot in Ubuntu that should work with Android and Windows Phone devices

sudo add-apt-repository ppa:nilarimogard/webupd8
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install ap-hotspot
sudo ap-hotspot configure

sudo ap-hotspot start

Use this configuration in your android phone or laptop for connection

To stop the wireless hotspot, execute this command in Ubuntu terminal:

sudo ap-hotspot stop

The post Share PC internet connection over wifi in ubuntu appeared first on .

item.title: How to add virtual host in ubuntu
item.dc:creator: Arvind Kumar
item.description:
1) Edit the file /etc/hosts and add host in file 127.0.0.1 foo 2) Go to /etc/apache2/sites-available/ and create a file with name foo (file name should be hostname ) and content of file will be like ServerName foo DocumentRoot /var/www/foo/foo…

The post How to add virtual host in ubuntu appeared first on .
item.content:encoded:
1) Edit the file /etc/hosts and add host in file
127.0.0.1 foo

2) Go to /etc/apache2/sites-available/ and create a file with name foo (file name should be hostname ) and content of file will be like


ServerName foo
DocumentRoot /var/www/foo/foo

# Other directives here

Options FollowSymLinks
AllowOverride None


Options Indexes FollowSymLinks MultiViews
AllowOverride None
Order allow,deny
allow from all

3) Run below commands to activate host

sudo a2ensite foo
sudo /etc/init.d/apache2 reload

The post How to add virtual host in ubuntu appeared first on .

item.title: How to install MongoDB on Ubuntu
item.dc:creator: Arvind Kumar
item.description:
Please follow the steps for installation. 1.Import the public key used by the package management system sudo apt-key adv --keyserver hkp://keyserver.ubuntu.com:80 --recv 7F0CEB10 2.Create a list file for MongoDB. echo 'deb http://downloads-distro.mongodb.org/repo/ubuntu-upstart dist 10gen' | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/mongodb.list 3.Reload local…

The post How to install MongoDB on Ubuntu appeared first on .
item.content:encoded:
Please follow the steps for installation.

1.Import the public key used by the package management system

sudo apt-key adv --keyserver hkp://keyserver.ubuntu.com:80 --recv 7F0CEB10

2.Create a list file for MongoDB.

echo 'deb http://downloads-distro.mongodb.org/repo/ubuntu-upstart dist 10gen' | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/mongodb.list

3.Reload local package database.

sudo apt-get update

4.Install the MongoDB packages.

sudo apt-get install -y mongodb-org

If all above command run successfully ManogoDB is installed successfully.

a) Start MongoDB

sudo service mongod start

b) Stop MongoDB

sudo service mongodb stop

c) Restart MongoDB

sudo service mongodb restart

d) To use mongodb run

mongo

The post How to install MongoDB on Ubuntu appeared first on .

item.title: Install fonts in Ubuntu 12.04
item.dc:creator: Suraj Koli
item.description:
Steps : 1) Go to Home folder 2)  press ctrl+H(to access hidden file and folder) 3) Copy your fonts into .fonts folder. 4) Done..

The post Install fonts in Ubuntu 12.04 appeared first on .
item.content:encoded:
Steps :

1) Go to Home folder

2)  press ctrl+H(to access hidden file and folder)

3) Copy your fonts into .fonts folder.

4) Done..

The post Install fonts in Ubuntu 12.04 appeared first on .
